author: perrotta
body:
The Static Analizer run for #36046 points out to a rather obvious bug in CSCGEMMatcher::calculateGEMCSCBending which should get fixed here

Please @dildick @rekovic have a look. You can also include this commit in #36046, if you think so.
But if you believe that such PR is ready to go, it can be merged and this fix will follow

#### PR validation:

It builds
title: Fix the slope return value in CSCGEMMatcher::calculateGEMCSCBending
